description:
DEMOLITION OF EXISTING GARAGES AND CONSTRUCTION OF 2 BEDROOM DETACHED HOUSE ON 2 FLOORS WITH GARDEN AND PARKING AREA

TO PLOT AT REAR OF 199 LYNDHURST AVENUE
